scripts.backup: git add . && node -e "const d=new Date(); const s=d.getDate().toString().padStart(2,'0')+'-'+(d.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,'0')+'-'+d.getFullYear()+'_'+d.getHours().toString().padStart(2,'0')+'-'+d.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,'0')+'-'+d.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2,'0'); require('child_process').execSync('git commit -m \"backup ' + s + '\"', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
